Inviting Dr Sharon Blackie to speak at your event

Sharon is a sought-after speaker and has given keynote addresses at a variety of international events. Over the course of her long career, she has spoken to a wide range of audiences in many different settings: general, Jungian, academic, corporate. In the UK, her ticketed talks regularly sell out at large venues of 200-300 people, both in person and online.

If you’d like to invite Sharon to speak at your event, or to give an online lecture, please email her with full details – date, location, event description and your proposed fee. Do give sufficient notice as her diary is often full several months in advance.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FCFCF2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]
